attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please cease and disband all PCT's they are too costly, make decisions against the Public's Wishes and detract from the service the NHS gives to the People.  This money could be spent giving better NHS service and equipment.  Encoumbant within this is giving back control of Hospitals back to the qualified Doctors and Nurses.  Currently, proffessional administrators have downgraded the NHS services to the people.  We pay more and get less.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
